casebody.data:
GULF STATES UTILITIES COMPANY, Plaintiff, v. ECODYNE CORPORATION et al., Defendants, Ecodyne Corporation, Third-Party Plaintiff-Appellant, American Motorists Insurance Company, Third-Party Defendant-Appellee. No. 78-1139. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Aug. 2, 1978. Richard E. Gerard, Jr., Lake Charles, La., for Ecodyne Corp. Plauche, Smith, Hebert & Nieset, Reid K. Hebert, Lake Charles, La., for American Motorists Ins. Co.

Before THORNBERRY, GODBOLD and RUBIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This case is affirmed on the basis of the opinion of the District Judge, reported at 441 F.Supp. 787.
